revised_title: Investigations on the Scattering of Light in Colloidal Solutions and Gels
tldr: The author investigates the scattering of light in colloidal solutions and gels, focusing on agar sols and gels. They study the optical properties of colloids to understand their structure, size, and shape of particles. The author uses a systematic approach to gain insight into the formation of colloidal solutions and discuss the implications of their findings on the theory of gel structure.
